import React from 'react'; import emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; import { useForm } from '../../hooks/useForm'; export const ContactSection = () => { const initialValues = { name: 'Rodrigo', email: 'rodriguezrodrigo127@gmail.com', phone: '3764254254', subject: 'Probando', message: 'estoy probando trolazo no te enojes' } const [ formValues, handleInputChange ] = useForm( initialValues ); const { name, email, phone, subject, message } = formValues; const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); e.preventDefault(); emailjs.send('probando1','probando2', e.target, 'service_8z8jkky') .then((response) => { console.log('SUCCESS!', response.status, response.text); }, (err) => { console.log('FAILED...', err); }); console.log( formValues ); } return (

Contacto

Contacto directo

(376)4357291
(376)4357291

Nuestra oficina

Deje su mensaje y nos comunicaremos

) }
